metadata.name: PowerShell Console History Logs Deleted
metadata.comment: Detects the deletion of the PowerShell console History logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('4') AND endswith(lower(file.path), lower('\\psreadline\\consolehost_history.txt')))

output.summary: Detects the deletion of the PowerShell console History logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence
